description:
This Starship Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 1 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

 *Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play. The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Neptune Starship Pack* includes: 
-One digital Neptune Starship
-One digital Judge Pilot
-One digital Levitator Weapon

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas Game required to play. 

Equip your Levitator weapon to fire homing siege missiles at your enemies. The Neptune is built to endure and deal heavy damage, making it an excellent choice for a tough fight. Judge's Pilot Ability, Time Shift, allows him to distort time and gives him unlimited Weapon Energy while activated.*
name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Neptune Starship Pack
